official-title.#text:
To prohibit the disbursement of funds for salaries and
		  expenses of the offices of Members and committees of Congress and to hold the
		  salaries of Members of Congress in escrow if Congress does not adopt a
		  concurrent resolution on the budget on or before May 15 of each year, and for
		  other purposes.

introduced

			 Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the
			 jurisdiction of the committee concerned

header.#text:
